entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
